name: touchingly
content:

in a way that makes you feel emotion, especially sadness or sympathy: He spoke touchingly about how important he felt this work was. The children are touchingly loyal to their parents. See
touching
More examplesFewer examplesThe characters in the show each have tiny flaws that only make them more touchingly human.She gives a touchingly real performance as the young girl.The dress made her seem, touchingly, much younger.
